ISSUE.TITLE: Update translation docs to use `--force` when pulling translations
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Change Type Correction ### Area Development ### Proposed Changes Update all references to the `tx pull` Transifex client invocation to include the `--force` flag. This is needed to ignore the modification time of local translation files, which might falsely appear as newer than those on Transifex due to a recent `git pull`.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #19139: Use --force when invoking tx pull
Merge pull request #19178 from netbox-community/19139-tx-force-pull Closes #19139: Use --force when invoking tx pull
